title: Public Records Request - Arrest of Michelle Nicole Harbin

communications.subject: Florida Sunshine Law Request: Public Records Request - Arrest of Michelle Nicole Harbin
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

all video and audio recordings related to the arrest of Michelle Nicole Harbin on or around September 20, 2022, by the Eustis Police Department.

Please include:

All body-worn camera footage from every officer who was involved in the traffic stop, pursuit, or arrest of Michelle Nicole Harbin.

Any dashcam or in-car video capturing the pursuit or interaction.

Any surveillance or third-party video collected or retained by the department in connection with this incident.

Any audio recordings related to the incident, including dispatch or radio communications.

Identifying Information:

Full Name: Michelle Nicole Harbin

Date of Incident: September 20, 2022 (reported September 24, 2022)

Location of Incident Start: Near Bay Street and Orange Avenue, Eustis, FL

Location of Incident End: Near David Walker Drive and Mount Homer Road, Eustis, FL

Charges: Fleeing to elude a law enforcement officer, two counts of child neglect

Passengers Involved: Thomas Riggio (front seat), 15-year-old daughter, 10-year-old son

Officers approached vehicle with firearms drawn after low-speed pursuit

Please notify me of any costs prior to fulfilling this request and feel free to contact me if further clarification is needed to locate the relevant records.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Police Cam News
